UNCTAD sceince techno for sust urbanization_en_out.html

The TF-IDF algorithm has been used for the results. While using a minimum score of 0.3 and minimum average word weight of 0.01. If the score per category doesn't contain any scores it has been left out in the overview. Keep in mind that the term weight values are multiplied based on their PoS value. Only the PoS tags verb, noun, adjunctive and SPEC have a PoS value of 1. The rest have a value of 0.

The system in Ahmedabad is India most extensive and successful bus rapid transit system

Label: 0, with a score of: 1

The long term vision under integrated solid waste management is to establish circular economy in which the use of materials and the generation of waste are minimized any unavoidable waste is recycled or remanufactured and any remaining waste is treated in way that causes the least damage to health and the environment or even creates value by recovering energy Totty and United Nations Environment Programme
